name: Jissen Mahjong
overview: Jissen Mahjong is a 4-player riichi mahjong game that offers both 2D and full-3D visuals of the mahjong table. The game includes three modes: Challenge Mode tasks the player with defeating various opponents to increase their rank; while Free Battle Mode and Party Mode let the player choose any three of the 10 available opponents and play a regular match with various options. There are also a wide range of configuration options for adjusting the game rules.
